code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import API_BASE_URL from'../apiConfig';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Analytics(){const[analytics,setAnalytics]=useState({totalAmount:0,totalMessages:0,mostActiveHours:[]});useEffect(()=>{const fetchAnalytics=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/api/appreciation/analytics`);setAnalytics(response.data);}catch(error){alert('Error fetching analytics');}};fetchAnalytics();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto mt-20 p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Analytics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white shadow-md rounded px-8 pt-6 pb-8 mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Total Amount Sent:"})," $",analytics.totalAmount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Total Messages Sent:"})," ",analytics.totalMessages]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-bold mt-4",children:"Most Active Hours"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:analytics.mostActiveHours.map((hour,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Hour ",hour.hour,": ",hour.count," messages"]},index))})]})]});}export default Analytics;
